title: Equipment Features
tags: where to get equipment in bg3
content: Versatile Hitter Adamantine Longsword Your weapon hits hard enough to send your target Reeling for 1 turn if you are holding it in one hand, and 2 turns if you are holding it in both. Reeling condition: Recovering from receiving a terrible blow or hitting a strong metal. Has a -1 penalty to Attack Rolls for every turn remaining. Dig Deep Deep Delver On a hit, inflict Shattered on a target. When attacking a Shattered target, deal an additional 1d4 Piercing damage. Night Walker Disintegrating Nigh
